name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY and Emory Smith v. GOVERNOR'S OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION and Global Tel*Link Corporation. Appeal of Emory Smith
name_abbreviation: Smolsky v. Governor's Office of Administration

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of April, 2012 the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
